item.title: Nikola, a new learning experience
item.dc:creator: Mrinal Purohit
item.description:
For the past year or so, I have been using Jekyll to maintain my site on GitHub which was just a simple single page with details about me, my projects, and skills (which I never updated.) So as someone using Python for every menial task, I set out to check some static site generators in Python. And so, I stumbled upon
